Author: crazyrunner92
Text: I went to go donate on Thanksgiving last year with my dad....I passed the hemoglobin count...barely...and my veins just would not pump out blood. They were only able to get 1/5 of what they needed in twice the time allowed. Waste of blood and their time. Veins just too small with no blood pressure. Even drank two bottles of water while hooked up.
